author: Staff Reporter
text:
A group of persons from Koppampatti lodged a complaint against an AIADMK functionary, who reportedly cheated them to the tune of Rs.80 lakh here on Monday.

In a complaint lodged with the police, S. Malaiyandi, one of the complainants, stated AIADMK functionary V. Jeyaraman of Koppampatti had assured to get jobs in TANGEDCO and collected Rs.80 lakh from 60 persons four years ago. But he did not get jobs to a single person so far.

Another complainant Ramakrishnan said that the functionary demanded Rs.2 lakh as advance to get the job. I handed over Rs.1 lakh to him but he did not get me the job, he complained.
title: Complaints against AIADMK functionary
